Personal_Info_Data.description: The Business Title for the worker's primary position. This value cannot be updated in the Update Employee Personal Information or Update Contingent Worker Personal Information. It should be updated using the Edit Position operation.

Name_Data.description: Boolean attribute indicating whether this is the Default name.
Boolean attribute indicating whether this is the Preferred name
Date of last change to Name.

Country_Reference.description: ISO Code identifying the country where the naming rules for this name are defined. Workday provides the ability for a customer to specify an ISO Code at the country level. Each customer can also define various rules around names, required fields for names, labels for name fields at the Country level.http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3

validation.validation: No Country with that Country Code Exists.
validation.description: A valid instance of Country must exist for the value of Country ISO Code.

Name_Data.description: Country ISO code. If the Country ISO code is specified, then this ISO code will be used to determine the Country Phone Code for (eliminate space between f and o) the phone. Pass this ISO code to distinguish between multiple countries sharing the same Country Phone Code. (For example, 1 is the Country Phone Code that is shared by USA, Canada, Dominican Republic, Bermuda, Jamaica, and Puerto Rico.)
Defining the type of name. Typical uses include using to capture Preferred or Maiden names.

Phone_Number_Data.description: Country ISO code. If the Country ISO code is specified, then this ISO code will be used to determine the Country Phone Code for (eliminate space between f and o) the phone. Pass this ISO code to distinguish between multiple countries sharing the same Country Phone Code. (For example, 1 is the Country Phone Code that is shared by USA, Canada, Dominican Republic, Bermuda, Jamaica, and Puerto Rico.)

Demographic_Data.description: Reference element representing a unique instance of Marital Status.

validation.validation: Marital Status Description does not exist for the location context for the person's location. Additionally, it must not be Inactive.
validation.description: A valid instance of Marital Status must exist for the given value of Marital Status Description in a specific Location Context.  The location context is derived from the person's location.

Ethnicity_Reference.description: Along with Organization (defines Regulatory Region), unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Ethnicity.

validation.description: A valid instance of Integration ID must exist for the given System ID.

Organization_Reference.description: Integration ID reference is used as a unique identifier for integratable objects in the Workday system.

validation.validation: Organization Reference Integration ID does not exist!
validation.description: A valid instance of Organization must exist for the given Integration ID Reference.

validation.description: A valid instance of Organization also infers that the Organization is in an Active status.

Demographic_Data.description: Reference element representing a unique instance of Ethnicity.  Ethnicity is a singular relationship with Demographic Data as of 8.  For certain tenants, especially US Public Sector Higher Education, Ethnicity may be a non-singluar relationship (as of V13).

validation.validation: Ethnicity Name does not exist in the Location Context of the person. Additionally, it must not be Inactive. The Location Context is derived from the location's country.
validation.description: A valid instance of Ethnicity must exist for the given value of Ethnicity Name and Location Context.  The Location Context is derived from the person's location country.

Citizenship_Status_Reference.description: Along with Country Reference, unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Citizenship Status.

Country_Reference.description: ISO Code identifying the country where the naming rules for this name are defined. Workday provides the ability for a customer to specify an ISO Code at the country level. Each customer can also define various rules around names, required fields for names, labels for name fields at the Country level.http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3

validation.validation: No Country with that Country Code Exists.
validation.description: A valid instance of Country must exist for the value of Country ISO Code.

Citizenship_Status_Reference.description: Country ISO code. If the Country ISO code is specified, then this ISO code will be used to determine the Country Phone Code for (eliminate space between f and o) the phone. Pass this ISO code to distinguish between multiple countries sharing the same Country Phone Code. (For example, 1 is the Country Phone Code that is shared by USA, Canada, Dominican Republic, Bermuda, Jamaica, and Puerto Rico.)

Demographic_Data.description: Reference element representing a unique instance of Citizenship Status.

validation.validation: The Citizenship Status does not exist in the specified Regulatory Region
validation.description: A valid instance of Citizenship Status must exist for the given value of Citizenship Status Description and Country Reference.

validation.validation: Inactive citizenship statuses are not allowed in this request.
validation.description: Inactive citizenship statuses are not allowed in this request.

CountryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CountryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Personal_Preferences_Data.description: If true, sets email preferences to the 'immediate email' notification channel for the following notification types: tasks, to-dos, custom business process notifications, approvals. If false, sets email preferences to the 'disabled' notification channel for the following notification types: tasks, to-dos, custom business process notifications, approvals. If no value is specified, there is no impact on the email preferences.NOTE: To-dos, tasks, approvals, and custom business process notifications types must be enabled for user preferences and have an allowed channel of "disabled" in order to set this to false or an allowed channel of "immediate email" in order to set this to true.

Person_Data.description: Encapsulating element for all Personal Preferences.

Personal_Info_Data.description: All of the personal data. This includes name, contact information (Email, Phone, Address, Web, Instant Messenger), Visa and ID information, Biographic, Demographic, and Background Check Information.

SchoolObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Education_History_Data.description: The School in which studies took place.
Text attribute identifying name of Education Institution.

School_Type_Reference.description: Unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Educational Institution Type.

Degree_Reference.description: Unique attribute name/description identifying a valid instance of Degree.

validation.validation: Degree Name does not exist.
validation.description: A valid instance of Degree must exist for the given value of Degree Name.

Education_History_Data.description: The degree program in which studies took place.

Degree_CompletedObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Degree_CompletedObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Degree_CompletedObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Education_History_Data.description: Indicates whether the degree was received. Possible values are 'Yes', 'No', and blank.

validation.validation: Field of Study Name does not exist.
